title.narrative: Monitoring of the Forest Governance, Markets & Climate Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Monitoring of the Forest Governance, Markets & Climate Programme) is a component of Forest Governance, Markets and Climate reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £3,478,955. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Forestry policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: IPE Global Private Limited, Itad. The start date is 01-02-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Forestry - Economic Affairs - Forestry - policy, planning and administration
